title: Mike Mignola - Comics Collection (No Hellboy)
description:
MIKE MIGNOLA  - (NON HELBOY UNIVERSE) COMICS COLLECTION (jun, 2013.)

This collection contains comics of Mike Mignola (pencils, art, stories, sketches, interviews) without any comics from Hellboy Universe (Hellboy, B.P.R.D., Abe Sapien, Baltimore, Lobster Johnson, Sir Edward Grey Witchfinder, Sledgehammer).
There is no comics in the collection with only covert art by Mignola.

This 4 comics I couldn't find anywhere on the internet: 
- Happy Endings - Dark Horse Maverick Annual (2002)
- Nursery Rhyme Comics Graphic Novel (2011)
- Scatterbrain 1 (1998) 
- (9-11) September 11th. 2001 - "Artists Respond" Vol. 1 (2002)
I would be eternally grateful if someone can upload them, so we can complete this collection. Thank you. 

All files in CBR. and CBZ. format
Download CDisplay here - http://www.cdisplay.me/

INTERVIEW
- Comic Book Artist 23 (TwoMorrows, 2002) - interview, portfolio and comic art catalog

Not my scans/downloads, only collected them and put them all together.

Please SEED
